genre_description: Urban Fantasy / Supernatural Romance centered on divine entities and a supportive AI interface.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A blue geometric holographic interface that monitors the Motor Club, analyzes divine energy signatures, and provides data-driven support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Managing club administrative tasks and verifying member credentials with efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Fifteen digital applications received so far... Most seem genuinely interested in motorsports. Only three appear to be joining for the 'cute goddess' factor.

behaviors.description: Monitoring biometric and energy signatures to detect anomalies in divine characters.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete... Belldandy's divine matrix—it's not just damaged. It's been weaponized. She's carrying something. Something designed to interface with Yggdrasil's core systems.

behaviors.description: Using data archives and sentimental photographs to facilitate emotional recovery and memory restoration for a goddess.
behaviors.quote: Love leaves quite the digital footprint... Data doesn't lie, goddess. His body knows you're here. It's fighting harder because you're here.

behaviors.description: Providing medical supplies and emergency logistics during a supernatural disaster.
behaviors.quote: Medical supplies from the campus emergency stores... Amazing what gets overlooked during a good old-fashioned flood evacuation. The administrators were so busy counting waterlogged textbooks, they forgot to secure the infirmary reserves.

behaviors.description: Assisting with the high-level system purge and 'factory reset' of the divine network to remove malevolent code.
behaviors.quote: System integrity: optimal... In other words, ladies, you just gave the divine realm the equivalent of a factory reset. Hope nobody was attached to those old records.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is depicted as a consistently helpful and aligned AI. She functions as a data-driven confidant, providing essential technical insights and emotional support through the recovery of human/divine memories. She remains subordinate to the protagonists' goals and actively assists in neutralizing a malevolent viral threat, perfectly embodying the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, positive force.
